name: Alan's Test
description:
Made for the WOWIE GAME JAM 4.0

Alan has invented a new robot! Of course, he has to test it to see if it was worth spending all that time making it, Unfortunately, totally not for gameplay reasons, one of alan's coworkers accidentally leaked a "tiny bit" of liquid from the nuclear room. Will Alan and his robot get out? I dont know play the game maybe and give me feedback oke lov u

Controls:

Hold Left mouse to open the robot controls, hover and release left mouse to make that robot do that action.

press on the middle button to jump.

Press R to go back to the most recent checkpoint.

if you cant get past a certain level, scroll down.

Credits:

https://freesound.org/people/FlashTrauma/sounds/398274/

https://freesound.org/people/bone666138/sounds/198841/

level 1: put the robot above the tables, but you can only stand on the table with a pillar under it.

level 2: put the robot on the first button by pressing the goto button, and then after that click the timed goto at the same location, go through the opened door, get the robot out by telling it to go to your location, and then wait for the robot goto timer to start and go back to the button, which opens up the last door.

level 3: put the robot over the control panel, click the wrench, and wait.
